TestDescription.name: Development configuration file
TestDescription.Description: A configuration file (e.g. Vagrantfile, Gemfile, Rakefile, ...) was found in this directory. This file may expose sensitive information that could help a malicious user to prepare more advanced attacks. It's recommended to remove or restrict access to this type of files from production systems.
TestDescription.Impact: These files may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Remove or restrict access to all configuration files acessible from internet.
